## projectCubemapCPU() function

Projects a function represented in a cubemap into spherical harmonics using CPU

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function projectCubemapCPU(input: TextureCube): Promise<Vector3[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  input | [TextureCube](doc/markdown/./device.texturecube.md) | The input cubemap |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

The evaluated SH data
